question: All India Kisan Sabha which was first peasants organization of India was constituted in which year ?
explanation: All India Kisan Sabha was formed by Sahajanand Saraswati on 11 April 1936. The Kisan Sabha movement started in Bihar. N. G. Ranga was the secretary of this association. The objectives of the organization was abolition of the Zamindari system, redyction of land revenue.
